alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 3:50AM EST until February 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Warren. In Pennsylvania, Carbon and Northampton. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact this evenings commute and also the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could reach around an inch per hour at times tonight. Some sleet should mix at times tonight for parts of the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
